players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Does anyone have any information that could help us identify the killer?"

You: "I'm deeply saddened by Diana's death. I had no idea she was in danger and wish I could have done something to prevent this tragedy. Let us all work together to find the truth and bring justice for Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
